de.ovgu.featureide.fm.ui.editors.keyhandler

Class FeatureDiagramEditorKeyHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.gef.KeyHandler
      • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.ui.editors.keyhandler.FeatureDiagramEditorKeyHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.base.event.IEventListener

    public class FeatureDiagramEditorKeyHandler
extends org.eclipse.gef.KeyHandler
implements de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.base.event.IEventListener
    The KeyHandler for the FeatureDiagramEditor.
    At Manual-Layout:
    to ensure that actions registered in will be handled first! default actions will be handled at last! Handles searching of features in the Tree.
    At Automatic-Layout: run GraphicalViewerKeyHandler first
    Author:
    Guenter Ulreich, Andy Koch, Marcus Pinnecke

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FeatureDiagramEditorKeyHandler(org.eclipse.gef.ui.parts.ScrollingGraphicalViewer view, IGraphicalFeatureModel featureModel)
      alternativeKeyHandler handles the KeyEvents, if the GraphicalViewerKeyHandler is active for auto-layout

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean keyPressed(org.eclipse.swt.events.KeyEvent e)
      use GraphicalViewerKeyHandler first if auto-layout is active handles the searching on the graph (depth-first, same way as in Outline)
      boolean keyReleased(org.eclipse.swt.events.KeyEvent e)

      void put(org.eclipse.gef.KeyStroke keystroke, org.eclipse.jface.action.IAction action)
      To handle 2 key handlers (otherwise there would be an action loop)
